summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of $65.02, from the general fund to be paid into L. I. D. No. 1309, created under authority of Ordinance No. 14787, in order to provide for refunds authorized in this district both by ordinance and by order of the Superior Court in Cause No. 63470, the said amount being the amount of excess in fixed estimate which was previously paid in to the General Fund.
